solution_line_template: The coloring takes {draw_time_per_pic}*{coloring_time_reduction_percent}=<<{draw_time_per_pic}*{coloring_time_reduction_percent}={coloring_time_saved}>>{coloring_time_saved} hours less than the drawing
So it takes {draw_time_per_pic}-{coloring_time_saved}=<<{draw_time_per_pic}-{coloring_time_saved}={color_time_per_pic}>>{color_time_per_pic} hours per picture
So it takes him {draw_time_per_pic}+{color_time_per_pic}=<<{draw_time_per_pic}+{color_time_per_pic}={total_time_per_pic}>>{total_time_per_pic} hours per picture
